title: WTB: AB 460 Wiltse, Camnitz; Cycle 460 Wiltse
author: trdcrdkid

posts.post_title: WTB: AB 460 Wiltse, Camnitz; Cycle 460 Wiltse
posts.post_content: If anybody out there has an American Beauty 460 Wiltse w/cap or Camnitz (either arms up or arm at side), or a Cycle 460 Wiltse w/cap, or if you know of anybody who has any of these available, I’d appreciate it if you could let me know.
